spec_data.Name: texlive-tabularborder
spec_data.Description:
The tabular environment is changed so that the outer
\tabcolseps are compensated and a \hline has the same length as
the text. No @{} is needed.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:22:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Remove excess space at left and right of tabular
